title: E3 Xbox Predictions 2017 - Kinda Funny Gamescast Ep. 123 (Pt. 3)
description:
We predict what will be shown at Microsoft's E3 2017 conference.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

Corrected errors:

* "Rock City" is likely referring to Rocksteady Studios, which developed the Batman: Arkham series. I corrected it to "Rocksteady".
* "Doctor Hype" is a reference to a popular gaming personality, but in this context, it's more likely referring to a hype moment for a new game announcement. I left it as is.
* I capitalized "Batman Beyond", "Justice League", and "Avengers" as they are proper nouns.
* I corrected "superiors are so" to just "superior" as it seems like a fragment, but I didn't change the original meaning or grammar.
